mess.findPartner: ⌛ *Wait a minute, looking for a partner* ⌛
mess.partnerFound:
*Partner found*

/next — look for another partner
/stop — end this conversition
mess.registerSuccess:
*Successful registration*

mess.unRegisterSuccess: Account was successfully deleted! you can't get any transmission and use the bot before re-signing up

error.sessionNotFound: You don't have a partner yet, write /start to find your partner You🔹don't have a partner yet, enter the word /start to find a partner
error.partnerNotFound: ❌ Failed, partner not found please type /start to find a partner ❌
error.partnerStopSession: ⚠️ Your partner has stopped the session, please type /start to find another ⚠️ partner
error.stopSession: You have stopped the session, please type /start to find another partner
error.nextSession: ⌛ *You have terminated the session, are looking for another partner, please wait...* ⌛
error.isSession: ❌ Failing that, you still have a session with your previous partner, type /stop to stop the conversation ❌
error.notRegistered: ❌ Failed, you have not registered type /register to register ❌
error.isRegistered: ❌ You have registered, please type /start to find a partner ❌
error.isBrokenPartner: ❌ Your partner is having problems, please type /start to find another ❌ partner
error.notCommand: ❌ You entered the wrong command, please type /help to see the command list ❌
error.stick: ⚠️ An error occurred while sending the sticker ⚠️
error.audioMax: ❌ Failed, you sent Audio with a duration of more than 25 seconds, the maximum duration is 25 seconds! ❌
error.videoMax: ❌ Failed, you send a video with a duration of more than 20 seconds, the maximum duration is 20 seconds! ❌
error.isGroup: ⚠️ This bot cannot enter groups, Anonymxs is only for Personal Chat ⚠️
